name: The Bloobles and the Quest for Chocolate
name_original: The Bloobles and the Quest for Chocolate
description:
Guide the Bloobles in this action adventure pixel puzzle game! Your job is to apply the actions whether it be jumping, blocking or rocket jumping to each Blooble to get them to the exit safely to continue their quest!

Story
Far far away in the deep dark depths of the woods, from within the Bloobles home, the Elder was telling The Bloobles about an incredible discovery! A strange creature was seen in the woods and it dropped something. A Blooble was sent out to investigate and what he found was a delicious chocolate bar! From that day onwards The Quest for Chocolate commenced! Go on a hilarious journey in this tricky Puzzle game!

Features
  • Cute critters
  • Awesome adventure
  • Can you help the Bloobles?
  • 100+ Levels
  • 4 unlock-able minigames
